nodes.text: Sajar Ohmo was a member of the nomadic enclave known as the Clan of the Toribota. Ohmo was quoted in Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of writings on the Force edited by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel.
Sajar Ohmo was first mentioned as part of a chapter quote in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
